pages.title: Ring Of Freeze
pages.text: You'll be able to slow your enemies down to a crawl! Imagine the power you'll wield as you encase your foes in a layer of frost, causing them to move at a snail's pace. It only requires 35.0 somnium to use. Whether you're in the heat of battle or just want to give your opponents a chilly surprise, this incredible ring is sure to come in handy. Embrace your icy powers with this amazing slowing ring!

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Embark on a journey of magic and creation with this special artifact! To craft it, you'll need to harness the power of the Arcane - a mysterious and ancient force that holds the secrets of the universe. With it, you'll be able to bring this artifact to life and unleash its full magical potential. So why wait? Gather your materials and begin crafting this mystical object today!
